description: The castle atop Drum Rockies on Drum Island, formerly ruled by King Wapol. The site where Dr. Hiriluk's Jolly Roger flies as a memorial.

keyEvents.title: Battle for the Flag
keyEvents.description: Wapol attacks Drum Castle and attempts to destroy Dr. Hiriluk's flag that flies atop it, leading to a battle with Luffy and Sanji.
keyEvents.significance: The castle becomes the stage for one of the arc's most emotionally significant battles.

keyEvents.title: Chessmarimo Created at Castle
keyEvents.description: Wapol uses his Baku Baku Factory at Drum Castle to create Chessmarimo from Chess and Kuromarimo.
keyEvents.significance: The castle witnesses the first fusion of living beings by a Devil Fruit power.

keyEvents.title: Hiriluk's Flag Raised Again
keyEvents.description: Luffy catches and raises Dr. Hiriluk's flag atop the castle, protecting it with his body from Wapol's attacks.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most iconic moments in Drum Island arc, symbolizing the protection of inherited will.

statusHistory.reason: Castle is operational and being defended during this episode
